The all-in-one platform for 3D and design

Spline is a design platform to create and collaborate on interactive production-ready experiences in real-time.

Get started — it’s free
Press and drag to orbit

Get started by remixing a 3D design made by the Spline community.

Empowering individuals and teams at world’s leading organizations

Where ideas become production-ready experiences

Supercharge your team to deliver production-ready interactive 2D & 3D experiences all-in-one platform.

"We wanted to appeal to an enterprise audience. That's where Spline comes in. It helps our brand feel more cutting-edge than our competition."

Andrew Pons, Principal Brand Designer
3D Design

Collaborative 3D Design, ready for production

A web-based, collaborative 3D design platform to create production-ready interactive real-time 3D experiences.

Learn more

Express your creativity in 3D

Familiar design tools to help you create your best 3D designs.

Real-time rendering
Primitives & 3D Modeling
Multi-platform exports

Layer-based materials

Create unique materials with multiple layers or use the ready-made material library.

Interactivity & Motion

Add interactivity and animation with Spline's powerful event system.

States & Events
Timeline Animation
Game controls
Physics & Particles

Variables & Data

Bring real-time data into your experiences with Variables, Webhooks, APIs and AI.

"With Spline, we can create interactive 3D objects that make our product feel tangible. It's more than decoration. It's how we show we care about the details."

Zeh Fernandes, Founding Designer
Design

Hana – a canvas for interactive design

A web-based and collaborative design tool to create production-ready interactive real-time experiences.

Learn more

Design & Collaborate

Familiar design tools to help you create faster.

Infinite Canvas
Frames & Auto Layout
Color & Strokes
Snapping

Vector Networks

Create custom shapes with a powerful vector network system.

Visual Effects

Enhance your designs with shadows, blurs, glass and 3D projections.

Interactivity & Motion

Design interactive and animated experiences with states and events.

Create and collaborate in real-time

Add comments, invite your team, or share a link! Brainstorming in 3D is easy with Spline.

Ship real-time experiences to the Web, iOS and Android

A multi-platform solution to seamlessly integrate interactive 3D experiences into your websites, apps, and digital products.

Web
Apple
Android
Press and drag to interact

<script 
    type="module" 
    src="https://unpkg.com/@splinetool/viewer@1.9.82/build/spline-viewer.js">
</script>

<!-- Add your 3D scene using the spline-viewer component -->
<spline-viewer 
    url="https://prod.spline.design/9951u9cumiw2Ehj8/scene.splinecode"
</spline-viewer>
Docs

Loved by innovative teams around the world

Read story
"I wanted to do something really cool with 3D, really bring our brand to life, and Spline was the only tool that would let me do that."

Andrew Pons

Principal Brand Designer

Read story
"Before Spline, we would need a developer just to handle the 3D integration. Now designers can focus on crafting assets, and engineers don't have to rebuild them from scratch."

Zeh Fernandes

Founding Designer

Read story
"Spline is very easy and fast to learn. The learning curve is low, even junior designers can step in and integrate 3D experiences into a Webflow project."

Pavel Dergachev

Founder & Creative Director

Getting started with Spline

Remix designs from the community and library, and learn with written docs and video tutorials.

Community Platform

Explore and remix designs made by other community members.

Explore Community

Spline uses cookies, pixel tags, and local storage to improve your experience, analyze app usage, and identify business visitors for sales and marketing purposes. This includes third-party tracking technologies. Essential cookies and analytics are turned on by default.

__llm_logo_reasoning.reasoning: Selected #0 because it is visible, located in the header, matches the brand name 'Spline', and links to the homepage, making it the primary brand logo.

primary.reasoning: Button #0 with text 'Get started — it’s free' is the primary CTA due to its vibrant brand color (#0062FF) and action-oriented text, making it the most prominent call-to-action on the page.

secondary.reasoning: Button #3 with text 'Learn more' is selected as the secondary CTA because it has a different background color (#262626) and provides additional information, complementing the primary action.

rawLogoSelection.selectedLogoReasoning: Selected #0 because it is visible, located in the header, matches the brand name 'Spline', and links to the homepage, making it the primary brand logo.

metadata.ogTitle: Spline - 3D Design tool in the browser with real-time collaboration
metadata.og:description: Spline is a free 3D design software with real-time collaboration to create web interactive experiences in the browser. Easy 3d modeling, animation, textures, and more.
